au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.gui.simviewer.model.listener

Interface ITimerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLIResultPrinter, MapUpdater, RunStateDisplayUpdater, RunStatusUpdater

    public interface ITimerListener
    The interface for the event of the grid environment timer This is used in place of the GridEnviron event to reduce overhead on a run, to get more accurate timing
    Author:
    Andy Heng Xie

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ExecutionFinished(GridEnvironResult result)
      Execute when a run of the planner finished
      void RunFailed(AEnvironTimer timer, Exception e)
      Trigger when executing environment threw an exception or take to long (as specified) Run in place of RunFinished
      void RunFinished(AEnvironTimer timer)
      Triggers when the whole execution finishes
      void RunPaused(AEnvironTimer timer)
      Triggers when attempting to pause execution
      void RunStart(AEnvironTimer timer)
      Triggered when execution begins

    • Method Detail

      • ExecutionFinished

        void ExecutionFinished(GridEnvironResult result)
        Execute when a run of the planner finished
        Parameters:
        result - all the relevant information of the environment right after planner execution this is separated to allow this be to run on a concurrent thread from the planner execution

      • RunStart

        void RunStart(AEnvironTimer timer)
        Triggered when execution begins

      • RunFinished

        void RunFinished(AEnvironTimer timer)
        Triggers when the whole execution finishes

      • RunPaused

        void RunPaused(AEnvironTimer timer)
        Triggers when attempting to pause execution

      • RunFailed

        void RunFailed(AEnvironTimer timer,
               Exception e)
        Trigger when executing environment threw an exception or take to long (as specified) Run in place of RunFinished
        Parameters:
        timer -
        e - the exception thrown
